description.ko: 통제된 혼돈의 관점에서 바라본 KURO-X의 정체성 탐구로, 엄격한 수학적 형태와 디지털 왜곡의 예측 불가능한 아름다움을 결합했습니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the KURO-X identity through the lens of controlled chaos, blending rigid mathematical shapes with the unpredictable beauty of digital distortion.

prompt: KURO-X aesthetic, sharp geometric polygons and crystalline structures, digital glitch effects, chromatic aberration, fragmented shapes, neon violet and electric cyan accents on a deep obsidian black background, high-tech data corruption, futuristic vector art, 8k resolution, sleek cybernetic texture.
